trans-unit.source: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

trans-unit.source: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.
trans-unit.target: 拒不参加公会～这便是她的处世原则。底密尔吸血鬼让她心神不宁，析米克想要拿她来活体研究，波洛斯誓要将她处以火刑，瑟雷尼亚愿能为她「治愈」一切。而阴影是她所需的唯一依靠。

trans-unit.source: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out—and the screaming began.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司狂欢人眼见怪物靠近，愈发情绪高涨、欢声雷动。见到此物仅会嘶嘶作响，他们便争先恐后用手中火把戳刺，以其蜷缩躲避之姿为乐。突然之间，火把接连熄灭～而后尖叫四起。

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: GRN·85 | Severed Strands | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 你获得等同于所牺牲生物之防御力的生命。消灭目标由对手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: GRN·85 | Severed Strands | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."
trans-unit.target: 「我已亲眼见过拉尼卡的命运。相信我，我这是为你好。」

trans-unit.resname: GRN·86 | Spinal Centipede | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 葛加理人喜欢用多彩昆虫的外骨骼打扮自己。昆虫也只好仿效人类而为之。

trans-unit.resname: GRN·88 | Veiled Shade | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: GRN·89 | Vicious Rumors | Flavor Text
